sections.title: Description
sections.raw_content: Returns the status of the check box specified by widgetID. If the check box is set (has an X in it), GetCheckBox returns true, otherwise it returns false.
sections.text_content: Returns the status of the check box specified by widgetID. If the check box is set (has an X in it), GetCheckBox returns true, otherwise it returns false.
sections.mdown_content: Returns the status of the check box specified by *widgetID*. If the check box is set (has an X in it), *GetCheckBox* returns true, otherwise it returns false.

sections.title: Example
sections.text_content: See GUI.CreateCheckBox for an example of GUI.GetCheckBox.

sections.title: Status
sections.raw_content:
Exported qualified.

This means that you can only call the function by calling GUI.GetCheckBox, not by calling GetCheckBox.
sections.text_content:
Exported qualified.
This means that you can only call the function by calling GUI.GetCheckBox, not by calling GetCheckBox.
sections.mdown_content:
Exported qualified.
This means that you can only call the function by calling **GUI.GetCheckBox**, not by calling **GetCheckBox**.
